sn35.167:1.3: “katham nu kho, bhante, janato katham passato attanuditthi pahiyati”ti?
sn35.167:1.4: “Cakkhum kho, bhikkhu, anattato janato passato attanuditthi pahiyati.
sn35.167:1.5: Rupe anattato janato passato attanuditthi pahiyati.
sn35.167:1.6: Cakkhuvinnanam anattato janato passato attanuditthi pahiyati.
sn35.167:1.7: Cakkhusamphassam anattato janato passato attanuditthi pahiyati.
sn35.167:1.8: Yampidam cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi anattato janato passato attanuditthi pahiyati …pe…
sn35.167:1.9: jivham anattato janato passato attanuditthi pahiyati …pe…
sn35.167:1.10: manam anattato janato passato attanuditthi pahiyati.
sn35.167:1.14: yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi anattato janato passato attanuditthi pahiyati”ti.
